name: Gunslugs 2
description:
The black duck army is back! They
are sending signals into space, which
can't be good... In fact, the army has
teamed up with aliens! You and the
gunslug squad have to defeat the
risen army with all their might again
before its too late. And of course the
slugs have enough equipment to do
that. Flamethrowers, tanks, guns and
many more are at your disposal and
ready to kick some alien butt!
